content.detailedDescription: On 4-12-11 at about 830 pm (est), i witnessed a light in the sky moving from side to side changing from red to bright white.  this activity continued for about 10-20 minutes before disappearing behind the trees out of my view.  when i first saw this, i was sitting in my truck talking on the telephone.  i then hung up with the person i was talking to and called my wife outside.  we both watched this for about five minutes before we lost sight.  now i live close to a military branch ( fort a.P. hill).  so this could very well be some kind of new technology our government is working with.  i have never seen anything like this and is wondering if there is some kind of explanation?  the camera on my cell phone could not pick it up.
content.summary: Sittiing in my truck, i saw a light moving from left to right changing from red to white at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: My buddy and i were shooting pics of sun,wondering why a black spot always appears in middle of sun on picture in digital camera.I took a few more pics and was downloading to computer to enlarge when we noticed an object to the lower right of the sun and the sunlight is glinting off it. it appears to be some sort of silver object that was only in one picture,like it was very fast.The photo is from my deck,looking westward at 5:00 p.M.,sept. 02,2010.
content.summary: Trying out camera,picked up unknown object in photo

content.detailedDescription:
April 11th 2011 8:10pm kiezer, oregon ufo sighted

while on a walk around the neighborhood with my family we were admiring the clear sky, moon and stars. i was looking at the sirius star shining very brightly below the half moon suddenly a large light similar in size to the sirius star slowly faded in between the sirius star and the moon. at first i had thought that it was a star coming into view but the object became brighter and larger untill it was as bright and as large as the sirius star,  after watching it slowly fade into view it shined as brigthly as the sirius star for about 15 seconds and it slowy faded out, it seemed to either cloak it self or leave the atmosphere. the whole sighting lasted only about 20-30 seconds. 

it was a calming beautiful sight to see and i hope i will see it again soon.
content.summary: Large bright light appeared between sirius star and the moon

content.detailedDescription:
It was june around 4pm beautiful clear blue sky. i walked out onto my patio deck to have a smoke when something caught my attention in the north sky about 400-500 ft in the air. there was a perfectly round ball or sphere of light that was static. at first i thought it may be a balloon, but balloons don���t sit still in the air, they always move with the wind. this object was almost directly above me and was not moving at all. i watched it for a few minutes before running into the garage and grabbing my telescope. as i am setting up the scope the sphere continues to stay static. about 10 minutes have passed at this time. i focus in on the object and all i see is a brilliant perfectly round ball of beautiful white hot light. the object never moves and stays in my sights the whole time. at this time my neighbor jeff stops by and i tell him to look up to see the sphere. he sees it and is just as puzzled as i am. he looks into the scope and sees exactly what i see, a perfect white ball. we continue to gaze at the object for a few more minutes until we move on to another subject. a few  minutes pass when i look up and the object is gone.
that was the only and last time i have ever seen anything so perfect, except my wife.

i am a cbrn technician for the us army fort hood, tx
content.summary: A brilliant white hot sphere / orb

content.detailedDescription:
Around 1:00 pm on day of sighting 2 chinook helicopters flew south along i5 corridor.  several copters were in the area flying low making triangulation difficult.  they were in the area around 30 minutes when a group of helicopters flying low, app 300' flew from the east heading west at a high rate of speed.  they crossed i5 at the green hill exit, i think mp 76.

three blackhawks flew with a net slung between them, one in the lead two trailing, and two gunships after them with guns trained on the loaded net.  the air speed was app 140mph limiting the sighting to several seconds per group.  two of the cargos contained disc shaped loads, 15' diameter.  the third, not necessarily in that order contained a isocelles triangular shaped object, simillarly sized to the blackhawk copters.

it was reported by a neighbor that a convoy of deuce and a half trucks were seen going up highway 6 at around noon, heading east.  troops were seen inside one of the trucks.

at midnight an observer drove east on highway 6 app 10 miles.  the road was void of traffic except for two washington state patrol cars parked together.

at midnight there was nothing in the air.  i went up on a hill in olympia and watched for 30 minutes at 1:00 am surveying a huge area and did not see anything flying. this is a main flight corridor for seatac, portland international, and mcchord air force base. at this point you can clearly see the olympia airport, flights out of mcchord, and the flight corridor between seattle and portland.
content.summary: Helicopters carrying ufos in nets

content.detailedDescription:
I was out doing my job as a sign waver on my last week of my work, i have to dance to music and wave at cars..... i turn to the east to wave to the on coming traffic and i notice something in the corner of my eye...... like a star. at first i thought, ok, it must be venus, but then i noticed it was moving...... i emediatly stop dancing..... i watch as it goes behind a cloud....... i think to myself, maybe its an airolight or something.... but then it starts moving eraticly like a bug..... i then new it was not a conventional craft and started taking mental notes so i could report it later..... 

the craft moved ne and then e twards a incoming set of clouds..... then back again to ne. it grew fainter as it flew, giving me the impression that it was traviling away from me...... it was maybe a good, 10-20 miles away or so.... i didnt see a paticular shape or size, and as it flew i had to squint to keep staring at it.....

at this time i realize that i am still on the clock, so i turn and continue dancing and when the flow of traffic was done, i turned back around and tried to see it where it was.... but it was gone.... then i noticed (eather the same, or a different one...) another star like object almost above the mall that was right acrossed the street from me.... it was moving exactly the same and seemed to give chace to the other one..... 

now i couldn't see the other one, so i don't know if it was another one or the same one, but this one was definatly brighter and closer....  

one thought did cross my mind as i was watching these.... there were a lot of people out driving and yet i seem to be the only one who noticed it. i took notice of several people outside but no one was paying attention to it.... at least from what i saw..... keep in mind i was still on the clock and this stretch of time mind you, was only around 5 minutes.... i turned to wave at the other side so as not to lose my job, and when i turned back around they were gone..... no mater how hard i searched, or squinted, not one of them were in sight......
content.summary: Shining star like objects

content.detailedDescription: Three of us, july 1978, teenagers at the time, were night fishing for eel on the shore of the sandy river in strong maine. we heard a whooshing sound, like the wind, directly overhead, we looked up, and said at the same time,  "wow look at that", and there was a black triangle, with rounded points. each point had a fixed colored light, (not blinking)red, blue, and green. the round lights were at least 10 feet in diameter, much bigger than any man made aircraft lights i've seen otherwise. the triangle was an estimated 300 feet each side. the craft was approximately  300 to 400 feet above us and made no noise except the sound of the craft cutting the air. the speed of the craft was about 20 miles per hour, too slow to be a conventional aircraft. it was below stall speed and should have crashed, but it kept slowly flying west, up river until it went out of sight. time span was about 30 seconds. my brother still thinks to this day that it was an experimental military aircraft. in my opinion, it was a technology out of our reach and beyond our capabilities at the time. this is the only flying triangle i have seen. i have had 9 other experiences that i will share at another time,4 of which were during my childhood in the 1970s. keep looking skyward my friends. phil62.
content.summary: Night fishing for eel on the sandy river, heard a whooshing sound overhead, looked up and saw triangle craft .

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving a popular strip mall in viera florida last night, i did my usual run where i would sit there with my boyfriend a few dear friends and just chit chat all night until we all decided to go elsewhere or just go home. well, 11pm rolled around and we dexided to leave after a while. we all walked out to our cars said our "godbyes" and left. right as i was pulling out with my roommate/bestfriend, i looked in the sky, an what i saw didn't suprise me i grew up keeping an ee out for this stuff, and saw my share of ufo's, the shock factor here was, how low it was! plus it was my friend's first ever ufo sighting. i slowly pointed up, assuming she'd miss it or something, and said "dude, what the hell...? did you se that? please please tell me you see that!" and thankfully, she did. "what on eart?! what is that? holy crap that's weird!...Is that a???" it was 3 green lights, lit up in the shape of a triangle. then all at once, they blackened into the night...I get excited and call my boyfriend to tell him. when he answers i begin to tell my story about what we just saw, then suddenly he cuts me off. come to find out he saw the exact same thing! so, i tried to call our other two friends who had left as well. no answer. a few hours later they showed up at our door. and when i mentioned something being in the sky, they replied "oh yeah! we saw the traingle green lights! my boyfrind also told me later, he watched the ting hovering in just one spot for a long period of time, and again no sound at all. he coul see it from afar when the lights turned back on he said. but then it dissapeared again.....

we are not alone.

*(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: It had 3 greens lights shaped like a triangle, gliding low, no sound at all, and would just hover in one spto for a long time. then dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: Numerous (more then dozens) star-like objects heading south away from the aurora borealis tonight. pictures of aurora borealis have been taken but the sd card so happened to of broke and the cord for hdd transfer is lost...
content.summary: Numerous star-like objects heading south away from aurora borealis

content.detailedDescription:
I was attending an outdoor strings concert at which my son was to perform his cello in the fourth grade orchestra. the performance was held at castles n' coasters in glendale. my sons class along with other fourth grade strings classes were to perform for 45 minutes then spend the rest of the day burning up the rides. 
 while waiting for the performers to get tuned and ready, i noticed four to six lights in the sky to the west. i watched as they seemed to fade in and out of the sparse cloud cover.
 i had brought my video camera and started recording clips of the strange objects, hoping they would show in the footage. (of course it's hard to tell by replaying the footage in the bright sunlight on the cameras 2 inch  monitor.) 
i continued to scan the sky and took six or so short clips of the objects, not expecting for much to show in the video result. i even approached another parent ,who was holding a video camera with a zoom lens,and asked if he could see what i was seeing, but through his zoom lens. he glanced to where i was looking but quickly lost interest. 
after viewing the footage on a larger res monitor, i was surprised that not only had the camera picked up what i saw, but also innumerable other anomalous lights or objects moving about in an erratic manner.
content.summary: Flashing lights in the western sky during daylight

content.detailedDescription:
i awakened to use the bathroom.I went downstairs,turning on no lights,then returned to my room,upstairs,in short order.I went to the window to look out at the moon and the orion constellation (i often look out at the night sky before returning to bed).The night was crystal clear and cloudless and i looked to my left at the stars and moon.I was immediately distracted by moving lights to my right and turned and saw a flying craft unlike any i have ever seen.
  it was shaped like a box,square at the front with rectangular sides and underside.The sky was very dark blue and the object was black against it.The perimeter of the underside was lined with lights,red and green (alternating),that sequentially turned on and off,giving a rotating effect similar to that of the lights bordering a theater marque.
  this object was large and very low.I estimate the front to be thirty feet square and the length ninety feet.The surface of the object was absolutely smooth,featureless and non reflective.There were no windows.The lights circling the lower perimeter were numerous.I estimate one hundred.They were not circular but shaped like footballs standing on  point and as large.
  the window through which i was watching this object was closed but the left side of my face was against the glass and i heard no sound.This was curious because this thing was so close.I estimate the altitude at about two hundred feet but heard nothing.Equally as curious was the speed at which it was moving forward.Maybe fifteen miles per hour and no variation.Its motion forward and level attitude also did not vary.
  there was nothing above the object holding it up and nothing below supporting it.Nothing was ahead of it and nothing trailing.
  the object passed out of my view over the back of the house and i turned,stepped to the center of the room,paused,and then sat down on my bed.Looking back,this inaction and loss of curiosity is out of character for me.I sat on the edge of the bed for a few minutes,eventually laying down,and slept until morning.
content.summary: Box shaped object with green and red lights at lower perimeter.Moving east, low and slow over backyard.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friends were at the terrace of my friends house just for some air, when one of my friend named *(name deleted--cms/sg) saw it for the first time. it was reddish orange in colour and blinking. my other friend said that may be a plane or a helicopter. but as we knew plane flying in night gave white light which looked like flurescent. and helicoptor could not fly as fast as it could have . we just decided to take video of it and i took my mobile phone with camera and tried to take the film but while zooming i took picture of it and took video for about 11 seconds. then suddenly it hovered just at one place and dissappeared. after that we discussed about it and with in 5 or so minutes other 2 same kind of object started to came from the same direction. they both had the same colour and the blinking effect with the same velocity of speed as the one of before. so we started taking videos which lasted for about 2 min and 24 secs. as, i have been watching documentaries about ufo sightings and as the characteristics of the above objects showed the same characteristics i've seen and heared in the ufo documentaries, we decided they must be ufos. we were very much excited as known to us. here in my country there arent much ufo enthusiastic and we saw it on the first hand. the video we have taken havent much details as it was taken by low quality of mobile phone camera and zoomed till the last. but the picture i've taken showed what we saw, as i zoomed it through photoshop it was amazing to see what we saw yesterday night.
content.summary: We saw it as a reddish orange coloured blimp.

content.detailedDescription: Here are some other great pictures... these web cams were extremly active tonight, why...I dont know???
content.shape: Cigar,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Ufos & usos spotted brooklyn~captured using web-cam

content.detailedDescription: I walked to the store tonight as usual. however, on the way home when i looked up as i always do it was as if something yanked my head to the side to turn me backwards. it was then i saw the object. i followed its path for about 15-20 sec. completely mesmerized by what i saw. my entire body tingled. it is colored gray because it was almost transparent. the lights were also dim, as if to add to the transparency, i couldn't believe my eyes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I saw a transparent boomerang in the sky over marshall.

content.detailedDescription: i was going for a quick drive to the local creamery, heard the sound of (fighter)jets wich only lasted around 40 sec; looked up, no sight of the jets. i was obout to get inside my truck while looking up and thats when i saw them, flying side by side, then 2 drop back forming a triangle, then the lead ufo droped back forming the same triangle but with 2 leading the formation. they seem to be white but were to far up to really be true on the color. 2 out of 3 other witness saw them but after they had spread out (ufo's). i ran to get my camera started recording, jus to my surprise it had no memory card in it. i had to go and the objects stayed there completly still. i was wondering if anyone heard, saw, or read anything that had to with jets been scramble near stockton, california.
content.summary: 3 ufo's flying in various formations and separating to a stop.

content.detailedDescription:
i had just returned my mother to her home near montgomery texas . while waiting on my mother to locate her house keys, i looked up at the sky and saw a triangular object the size of a wal mart store pass above.
moving from east to west, it make a very slight coarse correction directly over wal mart. very faint white lights ran the length of the leading edge with brighter tip lights.  this was a huge object, appearing to be black in color & moving silently. i was appox.3,000 ft or less from it and maybe 2,000 above me.
it moved out of my line of sight in 30 seconds or so.
content.summary: Large triangle passed over @ appox. 2,000', moving appox 200 mph traveling e to w

content.detailedDescription: Hello, i am male, 43, father of 5 girls.  i have started have very disturbing nightmares of an event that took place when i was a kid involving an underwater ufo.  first let me give a little back story.  i am from texas and lived on the sabine river.  my dad moved us out there when i was about 7 or 8.  we had no electric or running water the first 4 years.  we lived off the river and the land.  i would wake up with my dad early in the morning to go and check trot-lines.  a trot-line is a line that has other lines attached to it with hooks and bait.  this is to catch more than one fish at a time.  i am sorry if you already know this, but so many people ask me what it is.  one saturday we got up about 4:30am or 5:00am to check for fish.  we got in the boat like always and started with the first line.  we were about halfway when i noticed a light under the boat. it was small about 4 to 6 inches across.  my dad noticed it too, he turn and yelled at me that i dropped the light.  i  knew i had not messed with the light, so i quickly scrambled around to find it.  i found it and turned it on and shined it at my dad.  he was making his way across the boat to whip my tail, but stopped and look over the side at the light again.  i am not sure how it happened but the water around the boat lit up so bright it was like daylight.  the light was about 15 to 20 feet around the boat. it came close to the boat and stayed still for a few moments.  i remember it was cold that morning but at that moment it felt like it was around 80 or so degress. then bam it shot through the water faster than i had ever seen anything move.  i watched for a few moments, by this time the day was getting a little lighter and i noticed a wake forming about a mile or so from the boat.  it just rose up out of the water without a boat. it was a big wave like the ones barges make. i thought it was cool but my dad looked like he was going to be sick.  you have to understand something about my dad, he was afraid of nothing, but he look like my little brother who was scared of the dark.  i sat down and my father drove the boat as fast as it would go.  when we got near the boat dock i was getting ready to tie the boat off, but dad just drove the boat right up on the shore, which he forbade us to do because of cypress knee's.  he got up and grabbed the 10 gal gas tank to bring to the house.  it was almost funny.  i remember thinking it is not that heavy, by now he had both hands on it and i could see the veins popping out in his arms, then it just let go and the tank came up hit him in the face and in the water he went. i  just looked him puzzled as he dove past me grabbing my arm as he went.  now he was scaring me, this was so out of the norm for him i had to look a couple of times to make sure it was him.  he dragged me to the truck, ran to the house to get the keys and we flew down the dirt road at a pace that almost killed us a few times. we hit the highway and drove the 45 minutes to my uncle dales house in about 10 minutes, how he did not get pulled over and thrown in jail i will never know.  he jumped out, so i jumped out he turned and told me to get my ass back in the truck we were not staying. my dad came out with my uncle dale who look just as puzzled as i felt. dad jumped back in our truck and uncle dale followed in his truck.  my dad had to stop and wait for uncle dale a few times cussing louder each time.  we finally get back to the river and dad and uncle dale go over to the boat.  my uncle dale had been a radioman in the air force so i guess my dad thought he would know something.  i had to stand back from the boat because my dad was beside himself by now, but i saw them throwing something at the boat, so i eased up to see.  they were throwing bolts at the boat and the bolts were sticking.  they went back to the house to talk so i went over too the boat and started doing the same thing but when i tried to pull the bolts off i couldn't.  i heard my dad coming so i ran back to where i was playing at, so he would not whip me.  i saw them take the boat and our other boat out in the river. i watch as they sunk the boat with everything in it including the engine.  i was shocked.  my dad later told me if i ever told anyone about this he would beat me till i was dead, and i thought he would.   my wife was the first person i ever told and only after he died.  i would like to know if this has ever happened to anyone else.  and the boat was an aluminum boat, which i learned many years later that aluminum is not magnetic.  a lot of other weird stuff happened after that day, but i cant type it all so if you would like to speak with me my number is *(phone number deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Underwater ufo that magnitized our alumenum boat

content.detailedDescription:
My name is *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg). i recently returned from a tour of duty in iraq.  while stationed at cos garry owen, just outside of the city of al amarah,  i witnessed a ufo event that my friends and i could not explain away.  

it happened late at night, close to 11 or midnight local time.  we were all sitting outside of our living trailer enjoying the coolest part of the day and listening to music.  we had a cloud ceiling that night and no stars or moon were visible.  usually a clear night meant we would be running for shelter due to the fact that insurgents liked to fire rockets and mortars at us on those evenings.  so typically cloudy evenings would mean that we would be able to get some sleep or enjoy some time outside with our comrades without wearing our body armor. 

my attention was drawn to a single round light in the sky.  it stood out like a sore thumb due to the fact that there were no stars or moon out and that our aircraft (apaches, blackhawks, and chinooks) were not taking off or landing.  besides, our aircraft fly lights out at night so i knew it wasn't us.  i pointed it out to my friend christopher marko and he too noted the strange light.  we watched it for a while and made a note that it was flying in a manner that was highly unusual.  it seemed to be moving in all directions without any  concern for the physics of flight that i have ever seen.  it did strange right to left movements, looping maneuvers, and traveling in different paths.  

my driver, **(name deleted--cms/sg), went inside and got his camera and attempted to film the object.  it did not appear to show up in the view finder but he kept recording anyway.  before he got the camera out, two smaller lights showed up and were chasing the original light.  these lights moved very fast and began an amazing display of flickering, strobing, and multiplying.  this display lasted at least 5 minutes before all of the lights disappeared.  marko and i were amazed by what we saw and really were at a loss for an explanation.  we watched the film on his camera but it didn't show up on it's display screen.  he went inside to go to bed but i stayed up to see if they came back.  sure enough, about 10 minutes later they came back at the same spot.  they did very similar maneuvers and chased the single light again.  this time i ran after them as far as i could before my progress was stopped by our t-walls.  they were low enough to be under the cloud ceiling but i could not make out the shape or what they were.  after the disappeared for the second time, i heard multiple helicopters spool up and take off from our base.  i am sure that my group of people outside could not have been the only ones to have witnessed this event.

i told this story to all of my close friends and family when i got back home but was met with lukewarm reception.  they did not ask any questions or say much at all.  i don't think they wanted to upset me or hurt my feelings by saying that they did not believe me.  i just happened to be going through all of the pictures that my friends and i took in country and came across the two video files that we shot that night.  i realized that i had never watched them on my computer or a big screen before so i decided to do just that.  we did, in fact, capture quite a bit of footage.  i am attaching the video file for you to review.  i am hoping that you all can enhance the video quality and examine the phenomenon as well.  i know that they were not flares from a helicopter or aircraft because those start in a single point and fan out away from the craft.  they were happening all over the sky in random appearances, and reappeared a short time later.  i know for a fact that we hold total air superiority in country so anything that is in the sky is ours so i have two theories.  it is either a ufo or some high speed new craft that i am not aware of.  

i had to break the film up into two files because it was over the 25mb limit of my email.  i do have an original copy in its entirety.  in the first part you will notice the flickering lights and the randomness and vast scale on which they appear.  i don't have any advanced video software but did view it with the contrast and brightness on high and you can see the objects behavior more clearly.  it's pretty wild.  in the second part marko was moving around and caught our porch light, t-walls, and our trailer for a brief moment.  it was unintentional and that light was not what we were watching.
content.summary: One solid light chased by multiple flashing smaller lights

content.detailedDescription: I was with my homies and as i was lying on the ground outside i saw a boomerang like flying scary thing. i took pictures but i was sooo terrified aqnd i saw flames coming out of it. after like 5 minutes of looking at it i heard noises from the outside then it started to come closer and closer. but then it started zooming away and dissappeared.
content.summary: It came

content.detailedDescription:
Monday april 11th, 2011  approximately 1:15a.M. 

my friend and i were driving home in glendale, ca when i noticed an electric blue light flash in the left corner of the clear night sky through my  windshield. i pointed with enthusiasm and exclaimed, " shooting staaa..." and before i could finish my sentence my mouth dropped into a look of amazement and fear because it was not a shooting star. i looked over to my friend to see if she had noticed the same thing and immediately out of a sort of instinct she looked away to her right. all this happened as i slowed my car and looked back at the sky and saw what i could only describe at a ufo or an aircraft of some sort. the craft was almost a diamond shape, dark in color almost camouflaging with the sky but i could see its outline with three distinct circular shapes in what seemed to be its front. the craft was so close to the earth, closer than a plane and quiet, we had no music playing in the car. it shot up away from us, not straight up, but curved almost forward and disappeared in a matter of half a second  with the electric blue light trailing, widening away from the object. it was so close, and big, i don't know what to use as a comparison to its size. in that half a second it was like nothing was ever there. i pulled over in shock and tears rolled down my cheeks and i yelled, " did you see that?!! do you know what that was?!" my friend turned to me with a look of panic and tried to laugh it off then yanked at my gear shift in desperation to leave and said, " get the **** out of here before they come back!" 

i drove to her home and we sat in the car for about a half out in shock/ fear of what we had seen.
content.summary: A dark space craft hovering close to earth then darting away with a trail of electric blue light attached to it

content.detailedDescription: Me&*(name deleted--cms/sg)were watching the ky/conn basketball game.It was half time so i told him i was going outside to smoke a cigarette.He went to put his shoes on and i went outside.I leaned against his car and looked toward the north.About 300'above the trees which are about 1mile away,i saw a red light.It moved straight down to the ground,sat for about3 or 4 secounds and disappeared.Mr.Reid came out of the house a few seconds later,but the light was gone. i was telling him what i had seen,we looked up almost straight up and saw 8 to 10 white blinking lights,but we thought these were small planes.We got into my truck and went to where i thought the red light had sat down.We saw nothing.We also went down the road futher and turned down a path into a fieid,went down path for about 1/2 mile but still nothing. i didnot call law enforcement at this time.   the red light i saw after it was on the ground was a complete circle misty red and appox.25' to 30' across.The conditions outside was clear with very little wind.The object made no sound,did not blink,did not flash,did not flicker,and did not light up the ground around it. from mr reids house to where this light was,approx. 1 mile. behind the light is oak&pine trees approx.100'tall. off to the left at this same distance is a white building maybe20'x20'.To the left of it us a telephone tower with a red blinking light. the tower is approx.1 1/2 miles away. to the right of where the light sat down is a double wide mobile home about300'. between where i was and the trees,the white building and the mobile home is a 4 lane highway 264.This road runs east to west.I didnot report this untill 4/4/2011 to the wilson co.Sherrif.I did not get the officers name but i have his cell phone# *(phone number deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Red light above trees 300' came straight down got to ground sat for 3 or 4 seconds & disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
There has been a recent release of files marked secret, by the fbi. included in them are documents showing the us government cover-up of ufo"s.

the file is referred to as "the vault"

check this fbi url and see for yourself:

http://vault.Fbi.Gov/search?Searchabletext=flying+saucer

all files in pdf format.
content.summary: Fbi file proof of ufo's

content.detailedDescription: My two friends and i were fishing at kailua beach when i noticed the light and said jokingly to my friend that the light was back. i said this as he and i had witnessed what appeared to be the same object approximately a year and a half earlier in the same location. after the first event i carried a binocular in my fishing gear for a least a year waiting for it to reappear, then finally gave up and left it at home. it finally did reappear on the 26th of march, 2011. we witnessed this light that appeared to change color moving about near the horizon, at about 5-10 degrees above the horizon these movements were erratic and random and at varying speeds in all directions. it moved near the horizon at first and then gained altitude at times to at least 50 degrees. it made sudden stops and starts and moved like no terrestrial aircaft physically could. the light would dim at times and fade out of view only to return in a short while and continue its movements. we were amazed and continued to observe it for over and hour until we finally gave up fishing. here is the most interesting part; one of my friends used his cell phone in an attempt to document this phenomena. his phone would only record video for a short period of time,and he recorded three times in a row  for the length of time his phone allowed, which i estimate to be 15-20 seconds at a time. in the first recording you could here us talking and the sound of wind in the microphone. in the next recording which was seconds later a tremendously strong signal was recieved that sounded like random static, and underlying this was sounded like talking in an unintelligible language. it was definitely a verbal communication of some kind and lasted until the time elasped. the last recording which was again, seconds later, was the same as the first; just us talking and the sound of wind. my friend still has it saved on his phone and it gives you goosebumps to hear it. several days later this same friend was able to catch something visually on his phone and it is quite amazing. i have encouraged him to submit the evidence he has, so that others could hear it and perhaps offer some explanation. it was an amazing event, and the additional recorded evidence was interesting, but i am making no claim that the light and the recording were related, just a curious coincidence perhaps, or possibly something more. this is my recollection to the best of my ability, and i state these words as fact that is unquestionable in my mind, and is only reported so there is a record of this occurence.
content.summary: Light, that appeared to change color

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped outside my home onto my back porch and was staring at the crescent moon when 4 starlike circle objects appeared on the crescent moon sitting low on the northern horizon.  at first i wasn't sure what i was seeing so i moved back and forth to see if it changed.  it didn't. there was 4 large lights inside the outer rim of the crescent moon shining very brightly when suddenly smaller ones began to appear on the inside edge of the crescent and then more appeared towards the left point of the crescent that were lighting up and then disappearing.  the 4 large cirle objects were evenly spaced and covered about 2/3 of the outer rim and began just below the right point at the top of the crescent.  as i stared the smaller lights began to appear and some were moving and disappearing while a few ringed the inner edge of the crescent just inside the edge. next the moon appeared to be shimmering with lights.   i ran to get my son up to see it but by the time we returned outside it was gone.  the color of these lights was the same color of the crescent moon having the color yellow on the horizon.  i believe it was around 1:30 to 2:00 as i did not record the exact time.  it was cool to watch when the lights were causing the shimmering effect and this is why i ran to get my son to see it.  my son searched and noticed someone in alaska saw something similar to what i saw so i am making this report.
content.summary: 4 bright yellow lights encircling inside outer rim of crescent moon.  smaller lights flashing inside inner edge of crescent.

content.detailedDescription: hello! thank you for reading our report. this event happend friday night april 8th, 2011.  my girlfriend and i frequently sit out front with the dog and stare up at the stars. we know the planets by now and several of the brighter stars up there thanks to her sky map/phone. we thought it would be fun to take some moon pictures so i got out all the gear to do so. i set up a big telephoto lens with a 2x magnifier and mounted it to the tripod. i dialed it in at about 2200mm so that the moon was filling most of the frame. when you're zoomed in that close, the moon moves pretty fast through your field of view so you end up readjusting the thing fairly often. we watched the moon for about twenty mins, chatting away and taking pictures. suddenly, a very bright star appeared, very close to the moon on the bottom left. we both shouted at the same time "did you see that!?" it stayed right next to the moon for maybe 20, 30 seconds and then started to travel at a 45 degree angle up and to the left away from the moon. it was no bigger than the stars it was passing by but it was many times brighter. it traveled slowly across the sky in a direct line from a to b which was about index finger to pinky distance if you hold your hand out and make a bullhorn (that's what i did lol). then it stopped and stayed lit up for maybe 30 seconds more before it blinked off. we were certainly excited to see this and a little bit "spooky ookey" afterward but its that feeling of amazement you cant describe when you know that you are witnessing something other worldly. "so where's the damn picture?" well, i was trying to readjust/refocus on the moon when this thing blinked on and i just stopped thinking. we both simply could not take our eyes off of it! that's prob the hardest part to explain. we had it all set up to take pictures, tripod, giant lens and i'm even aimed right at the damn thing and all i could do was stare, up, in awe. well we're on the lookout now! good luck on your search!
content.summary: Bright star traveled away from the moon and then stopped in sky for a short time before disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Driving to work down ohio rd towards 121 (north) there was a silver cigar shaped object to the northwest.  i noticed it when i stopped at a light and it was above the signal.  at first i thought it was a plane but it was not moving and had no markings, paint, or wings.  i watched it for a minute till i lost it behind a apartment building, when i passed the building the object was gone.  i'm use to seeing airplanes living by dfw but this was gone in 5 seconds that i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Silver cigar shaped reflective

content.detailedDescription: Ok so me and my friend were driving our bikes and  like out of no were this huge thing comes out of the sky and illuminates a part of a tree in lareal park so were like what the hell is that?!?!?!? so right as me and my friend looked at it it turned of the lights and vanished so fast my friend took a picture of it but when we looked at it there was nothing there and the ufo had been there for 10 seconds and we took it i. 5 so were like wow that's creepy and right as it vanished we we when'd to check out where the ufo was pointing his beam at and when i was it there was a tree on the ground so were like wtf?!?!?!!?!?! the first thing that made me notice it was that it made q beam at a tree and so me and my friend were really wanting see what it is first we thought it was a plain crashing but the. it looked like a cross and crap and it had like 5 more of them in driferent shapes so were like o **** alien !!! and right as we stared riding our bikes towards the beam they dissapires so. fast like ultra lighting speed
content.shape: Boomerang,   Cone,   Circle,   Cross,   Sphere,   Triangle
content.summary: Huge flashing lights right as i looked at it it vanished had 3 more with it

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my brother were sitting outside talking when he said hey what is that? well i dont believe him. but he is like wow its gone. well i know that he is a non believer, and i know that he knows that i am.So i thought he was playing.Ive always wanted to see one.                                                                             tonight i did.                                                              well
                                                                                   well anyway every time i look away he,s saying oh u just missed it. so im thinking yea right . then i saw it. i will never be the same.
it was huge, with a triangulure shape. my brother said ,;do you see it now;? and isaid yes, and it disapeered. it freaked me out. but he took it all in stride.                                                                                i looked and looked but so far have not seen it again.         wow                                                                                     i am not kidding.
content.summary: Large triangle
